hero.description: Our gamified roadmaps help you prepare and get into the best universities.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a group of passionate students and graduates who are dedicated to helping you succeed in your academic journey.

member1.name: Abdesamad Ait Elmouden
member1.title: His friend
member1.bio: Bachelor's student at Al Akhawayn University in Ifrane, majoring in Computer Science and Mathematics.

member2.name: Achraf Ajrhourh
member2.title: Coffee Shop Owner

studyTip.title: Study Tip
studyTip.content: Try to solve the problem yourself before looking at the hints. Take your time and break it down step by step.

features.heading: Everything you need to excel in admissions
features.subheading: Our platform offers comprehensive tools to help you master each subject and succeed in your entrance exams.

roadmaps.title: Interactive Roadmaps
roadmaps.description: Follow personalized learning paths specifically designed for different entrance exams and institutions.

exercises.title: Practice Problems
exercises.description: Access hundreds of practice problems with detailed solutions to strengthen your understanding and test your knowledge.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Keep track of your learning journey with visual progress indicators and milestone celebrations.

achievements.title: Achievements & Goals
achievements.description: Stay motivated with achievement badges and clearly defined learning goals to keep you on track.

learning.title: Multi-format Learning
learning.description: Learn through various formats including text explanations, video content, and interactive exercises.

community.title: Support Community
community.description: Connect with peers and mentors for guidance, encouragement, and additional learning resources.

testimonials.heading: Success Stories from Our Students
testimonials.subheading: Discover how KaTuripu has helped students achieve their academic goals and gain admission to their dream institutions.

testimonial1.content: The roadmap approach completely changed how I prepare for entrance exams. I was able to track my progress and focus on my weak areas. I got admitted to my first-choice university!
testimonial1.author: Driss

testimonial2.content: The practice exercises were incredibly helpful. The detailed solutions and video explanations made complex concepts easy to understand. Highly recommended for anyone preparing for exams.
testimonial2.author: Ahmed Khalid

testimonial3.content: KaTuripu's structured approach helped me organize my study time effectively. The achievement system kept me motivated throughout my preparation journey.
testimonial3.author: Abderrahman
